wikipedia_page.main: Helen Smith is an English novelist and dramatist. She's a member of the Mystery Writers of America, English PEN and the Crime Writers Association. She lives in Brixton, London.

response: *Helen Smith (baseball) (1922–2019), All-American Girls Professional Baseball League player
*Helen Smith (nurse) (1956–1979), died in suspicious circumstances in Saudi Arabia
*Helen Smith (politician) (1927–2007), New Zealand politician in the Values Party
* Helen Smith, a character in the television series Moonbase 3
*Baby Bunny Smith (1888–1951), sideshow performer born as Helen Smith
* Emily Castles is an amateur sleuth in a British mystery series by Helen Smith.
* Alison Temple ('Alison Wonderland') is a private detective who joins an all-female detective agency in London in two books by British novelist Helen Smith.
* Best Short Story: Helen Smith, "Nana", Killer Women: Crime Club Anthology #2
